parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To laugh at, ridicule. To laugh down, i.e. Deride.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be dying, be about to die, wither, decay. From apo and thnesko; to die off.
